key_risk_themes: ["Critical Security Vulnerabilities in Authentication","Reliability of External and Internal Service Integrations","CI/CD Pipeline Health and Deployment Stability"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Prioritize rigorous security code reviews for all authentication logic (RISK-001).","Validate and monitor DNS and AWS SES configuration to ensure email deliverability (RISK-003).","Develop a targeted load testing plan for the login endpoint to mitigate performance risks (RISK-005)."]
